# mldpEHR

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/mldpEHR)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=mldpEHR)
<!-- badges: end -->

`mldpEHR` is a toolkit for building and testing lifelong prediction models for all cause mortality (longevity) and disease. See the [vignette](https://tanaylab.github.io/mldpEHR/articles/mldpEHR.html) for more details.

## Installation

You can install the development version of mldpEHR from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("tanaylab/mldpEHR")
```
